oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session Don Schlitz - 2018-04-21
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Don Schiltz from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on April 21, 2018. Includes vocals from Stacey Schlitz.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Don Schlitz; Stacey Schlitz;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening comments begin in progress with introduction by Sara Lederach / (02:41) Opening comments by Don / (03:33) Performs You're My Favorite / (05:57) Performs unidentified song likely titled Where Were You or One Promise Too Late / (08:44) Talks about the previous song and introduces the next song / (10:22) Performs The Greatest / (13:33) Talks about Randy Travis who's in the audience / (13:59) Performs unidentified song likely titled Oh What A Time To Be Me / (16:18) Introduces the next song / (16:55) Performs She Came With A Frame / (20:14) Introduces the next song / (20:32) Performs The Gambler / (25:16) Talks about his wife Stacey who joins him on stage / (26:13) Performs Not Too Much To Ask (Don with Stacey Schlitz) / (29:22) Performs On The Other Hand (Don and Stacey - vocal) / (30:39) Includes story about singing On The Other Hand at the Bluebird in front of Randy Travis / (32:55) Finishes performance of On The Other Hand / (34:33) Performs When You Say Nothing At All and the audience sings along / (39:01) Tells story about family life and merchandise on sale / (41:42) Performs Forever And Ever, Amen / (45:32) Closing comments / (46:53) Walk-out music / (48:23) Event off mic that creates applause / (53:50 Walk-off music ends / (55:28) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:format: original source recorded as an mp3 file at 44.1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Schlitz, Don; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
